title: KINGDOM HEARTS -HD 1.5+2.5 ReMIX-
description:
KINGDOM HEARTS -HD 1.5+2.5 ReMIX- is an essential collection of the first six stories in the KINGDOM HEARTS series, a collaboration between Disney and SQUARE ENIX. Wield the legendary Keyblade and unlock the true power of friendship as you explore Disney worlds and defend them from darkness. Song of Syx
Enhanced backgrounds make this collection more stunning than ever before. Start your KINGDOM HEARTS journey now

system_requirements.Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 750 / AMD Radeon™ RX 460
